column2: "You came, <%me>. You brought along the lady over there, I see."
"An ARKS member...! Do we have to fight again?"
"Whoa, no need to be so hasty. The Council don't have to obey Avis. Otherwise, we wouldn't be able to balance anything, right?"
"Anyway... our purpose here, if I had to explain, is close to yours."
"Good work scouting, Huey. So, how was it?"
"It's generally what we thought, Ane-san. Those three guys are there, all prepared and waiting in advance."
"Those Darkers, they're not letting a single one through."
"W-Whoa! It's you guys! Getting this far was admirable! Now, your next opponent is me...!"
"...This isn't the time for that, is it? Well met."
"Great job getting here. I'm sorry that we couldn't help you on the way here."
"If I had to put it into words, the other members of the Council of Six are seemingly running rampant."
"...that's why we're going stop to them, Huey."
"<%me>, wait, wait, wait up!"
"Haa, haa... I... I finally caught up to you!"
"It doesn't seem like she's targeting you... Do you know her?"
"If you have something you want to ask these two, do it after you come to your senses and everything's over. We don't have much time."
"I didn't come here to do that. I have my own objective."
"Zeno and I... no, I have always been watching them. What they've done, everything they do."
"That's why... I understand there's a reason for their actions. That right now, there's something they absolutely must do. I understand that too."
"That's why I'll help you out with what you need to do."
"That's what that meddlesome fool I know would do in this situation, after all."
"She's repelling Avis... I didn't think that was possible. Ah, that's why, she's..."
"Alright, you come along too. However, you protect yourself. From here on out, it's a whole different story."
"...I understand."
